channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dreamer tries to become a knight in 'Knight Smurfalot', then in 'Forget Me What?', when Gargamel accidentally breathes in the pollen of a rare flower it instantly wipes his memory. (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Kit's on the case when a prairie dog is stung in 'The Case of the Scorpion's Sting', then in 'The Case of the Constant Dripping', something's making a noise that is bothering some birds. (S1, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots have to get a picture of a rare bird for Abuela in 'Catch The Quickatoo', then in 'Lost Lorito', Dora and Boots return a baby parrot home, who can't stop copying Boots. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Kaiden and his Siberian Husky, Luca, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To rescue two alpacas stranded in the garden's snowy zones.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bat and Ball: Madame Gazelle decides to teach the children how to play Bat and Ball, but when it is her turn she hits the ball too far.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Buried Treasure: Peppa, George, Molly Mole and Freddy Fox play in the garden. Molly digs a tunnel and hits a box of pirate treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Breakfast Club: Peppa and her friends go to school early to have breakfast together. (S5, ep 29).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Botanical Gardens; Mr. Potato's Fruit & Vegetable Quiz: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Viking Day; Made Up Musical Instruments: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Day Off: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Shooting Star: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a presumed shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: In The Future; Doctor Hamster's Big Present: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Butterflies; Grampy Rabbit's Jetpack: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Detective Potato; The Electric Car: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Stone Age Granny; Space Adventure!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Cows: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Windmill: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: No Magic Day: For an entire day the Kingdom has to make do without help from magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Wand Factory: Holly breaks her wand and must go to the Wand Factory, at the bottom of the Great Elf Tree, to get it fixed.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hop, Skip and Jump!; Rescuing Miss Rabbit!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Diary; Playing Golf: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Park; The Lifeboat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Holly: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Fig's Magic School: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups dig tunnels for new books in 'The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Snack Dispenser', Mix, Charger, and Wheeler surprise Rubble. (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: No one's food is safe in 'The Forest Food Bandit', then in 'The Case of the Absent Giraffe', Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Paper Cup Popper!: Gabby unboxes a Paper Cup Popper that provides an endless supply of paper cups. As she takes it around the dollhouse, all the Gabby Cats find ways to use the cups. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fire Station Practice; Mr. Bull The Teacher: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Looking for Things; Poems: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Jolly's Riding Club: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Band: Snobby King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit the Little Kingdom, and Holly and her Mummy and Daddy enlist the Elf Band to impress them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Springtime: Springtime in the Little Kingdom brings out tulips, daffodils, hedgehogs. and two very hungry gnomes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Ant Farm: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef struggles to perform magic tricks in 'Noodle Bowls', and then in 'Spicy Cauliflower Bites', Chef makes an extreme snack. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Sweetie finds a mysterious orb in 'Pups Save a Golden Sweetie', then in 'Pups Save the Giant Ants', the pups must save a colony of giant ants from destroying the jungle and themselves. (S10, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus: Miss Rabbit arrives with the broken bus. This is a job for Grampy Rabbit! Once fixed, Mummy Rabbit and Rebecca Rabbit arrive with a cake for Grampy Rabbit's birthday! (S7, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops: Peppa is playing with Freddy Fox at his home, in an apartment above the shops. Peggi and Pandora Panda, and Candy Cat live there too, and help show Peppa around. (S7, ep 30).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!: Peppa and all her friends are having a sleepover - different friends in each of the apartments in the high street. So they play hide and seek across all the rooms! (S7, ep 33).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Larenzo Lion: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!: The playgroup is visiting the zoo today. Mr Lion then shows them a giant lizard! The children all believe it's a dinosaur.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation. (S7, ep 34).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Fruit Harvest: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Greenhouse: Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog are showing and sharing their lovely, tomato filled, Greenhouses to Peppa and George.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sailing Boat: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Masks: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children; making masks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Molly Mole: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Carlita the Ice Cream Truck!: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is.there's no ice cream! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Underground Chicken: The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Duck Pond: When water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find out what's happening.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; The Big Hill: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Hippies; Bug Hotel: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Games; Flying Discs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Cars: First, Peppa and her friends visit the Little Cars play centre, where Miss Rabbit is in charge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: Meet Issy and her water-loving chocolate Labrador, Mo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! When a group of baby ducklings waddles away from their mummy, it's up to Issy and Mo to bring them back safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a birthday surprise in 'Dora's Birthday Surprise', then in 'Moonlight Fiesta', Dora helps La Luna save the Moonlight Fiesta. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Whale Song Spectacular: The cadets throw a whale concert to attract baby whales for Gemma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Curse of Boomerang Island: A leisure sailing trip turns dangerous when a boat gets stuck on a reef.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Super Thinkers!: Gabby, Pandy and Carlita attend DJ Catnip's Super Thinker Camp, where they tackle the puzzles and obstacles so they can earn their rainbow capes and become Super Thinkers. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora is shrunk by Big Red Chicken's magic in 'Little Dora's Big Adventure', then in 'Bye Bye Balloon', Dora and Boots help get Benny's Balloon under control. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Papa Smurf appoints Rescue Smurfs in 'The Majestic 5', then in 'Kitchen Klutz', After Clumsy saves Chef's life, Chef takes Clumsy on as his assistant in the kitchen. It's a catastrophe. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Jokey gives Farmer's racing snails extra speed in 'The Round Up', then in 'Waffle Wednesday', Chef gets jealous when Lily starts to make waffles that are more delicious than his. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: No one's food is safe in 'The Forest Food Bandit', then in 'The Case of the Absent Giraffe', Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Elana and Meeka, a mixed-breed dog, as they join The Real Pup Squad! There's a big mess in the garden - plastic bottles, cardboard boxes, and all sorts of rubbish everywhere.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Please and Thank You: Peppa and George learn some wonderful magic words. Nice things happen when you say please and thank you.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Ice Cream: Mr Labrador is here in his new ice cream van. It is his first day selling ice creams. In fact, Mr Labrador loves ice cream - perhaps a little too much.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jukebox: Peppa and George have been sailing with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Back at the clubhouse, they discover a jukebox - but it is very noisy.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Windmills; Mandy Mouse's Birthday: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Sandcastle; The Castle: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.desc: Parachute Jump; Gerald Giraffe: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Simple Science; School Project: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Cake It Easy: When Thomas and Diesel compete in an impromptu speed contest while carrying prized cakes for Sodor's Cake Festival, they cause a disaster that really takes the cake! (S27, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: The Can-Do Crew: When Whiff has to leave Sodor for the day, the recycling responsibilities fall behind schedule! Thomas decides to get the Troublesome Trucks to help pick up the slack. (S27, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's all play and not much work when Peppa and George visit 'Daddy Pig's Office', and then in 'Pirate Island', Peppa and her friends find buried treasure, and a shopping trolley.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George Catches a Cold; The Balloon Ride: Two episodes.

channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: We Smurfed on the Moon: Leaf has a new, powerful magic wand, but doesn't know how to use it. She makes a mistake and turns off the moon! The Smurfs fly to the moon to turn it back on again. (S4, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back! (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: We see a strange land where Chickaletta is royalty in 'Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck', then in 'Pups Save a Desert Flounder', Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear home before he wakes up in 'Pups Save A Sleepwalking Bear', then in 'Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny', Daring Danny X goes off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: No one's food is safe in 'The Forest Food Bandit', then in 'The Case of the Absent Giraffe', Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Mission to Caturn: When CatRat gets stuck on planet Caturn, it's up to Gabby and Pandy to go save him. (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard The Elf Pirate: Barnaby Elf's uncle, Redbeard the Elf Pirate, comes to visit the Little Kingdom, but he has lost his treasure. Everyone must help Redbeard track down the treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.desc: The Electric Car; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Motorbiking; Breakfast Club: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Science Museum; Clubhouse Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Relaxation Class; Mountain Climbing: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A fire breathing dragon comes to life in 'Pups Save a Dragon', and in 'Pups Save the Three Little Pigs', the Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Being Babies: Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit pretend to be babies to get Mummy Rabbit's attention. Mummy Rabbit plays along until they admit they are not really babies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cushion Den; Staying Up Late: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New TV: Peppa and family are watching TV. until it breaks! While Grampy Rabbit fixes it, the family get a new TV which can do everything. but it doesn't beat their old TV.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Folk Music Band; Calling Kylie: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: House Rules; Big Announcement: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Indoor Adventure: A storm cancels Peppa and her family's adventure plans so they decide to take it inside. Using their imagination, they go sledding, climb a mountain and have a campfire in the attic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Plumbing: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. It's a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming round, there's not much time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Soft Play: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Market: Peppa and family find some great things to buy from the market and even get a special gift from Mr. Fox's stall.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Castle: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Jump: When the school roof is broken and needs fixing, Peppa volunteers Mummy Pig to do a parachute jump to raise money. Daddy Pig goes up too and has to overcome his fear of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Magical Mermaid-lantis: It's the big Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-lantis! But when the grumpy Kitty Squiddy tries to ruin the party for everyone, Gabby and Pandy must save the day. (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day; Party Bus; Movie Night; Art House Day; Wildflower Wood; Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better than the Paw Patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Ostrich: The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Trees; Canoe Trip: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaur Party!; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playgroup Garden: Peppa's Playgroup has a garden outside. The children are all having fun growing different plants and playing hide and seek in the wild wood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Isla and her Chihuahua, Gizmo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To find and rescue the lost penguins in the jungle and bring them back to safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back! (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Beach N Bush: Gemma and Spyke take cadets on an adventure to decide if the beach or bush is best.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Whale Song Spectacular: The cadets throw a whale concert to attract baby whales for Gemma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Snow Cruise: The Gabby Cats go on a cruise to see Pete the Polar Bear's new rainbow igloo. Along the way, Mercat helps them learn about all kinds of fun things that water does. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adventure', then in 'Swiper's Birthday Surprise', Dora brings a gift to a Swiper's party and must stop him from swiping his own gift! (S1, ep 5).
